description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas (Covid), Private Sector Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025 pregnant women, newborns, children and adolescent equitably benefit from evidence-based policies and coordinated quality health, wellbeing and nutrition services.

sector.narrative: Children, adolescent and youth engagement and participation
Technical assistance - Cross-sectoral communication for development

title.narrative: Georgia United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Georgia 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
